Messages.Author: Shehab Gamaledin Abdulkader Hussein Aboulela
Messages.Content: Dear all, Please note that we currently have an exam date on MOSES: - Monday 22.07 2024 To take the exam for the 9LP HFT mit Praktikum course, you will need to submit all the Praktikum reports atleast one week before the exam (by Monday 15.07.2024). Feel free to register already. Important: when registering, please also send a short mail request to Prof. Burla (burla@tu-berlin.de), with me (aboulela@tu-berlin.de) and Ms Gesine Pergl (g.pergl@tu-berlin.de) in CC, also indicating your Matrikel Nr. Please also let me know if you have any special constraint with respect to the timing of the exam, so that I can take that into account when defining the schedule. Shortly before the exam date, the final schedule with the exact timing will be sent via e-mail to those who have registered. I will also update you when we have new exam dates. Best regards, Shehab

Discussions.Discussion_Name: Reminder: Course evaluation possible till Friday 28th June

Messages.Author: Shehab Gamaledin Abdulkader Hussein Aboulela
Messages.Content: Dear all, I would like to point out briefly that the evaluation for this course only possible till end of this week Friday 28th June.  Professor Burla and I strongly invite you all to participate in the survey, where you could give us some feedback about the course and we can make this course better. You could use the link for the survey or scan the QR code bellow. Feel free to also write us any time if you have questions. Thank you. Best regards, Shehab Aboulela Link: https://befragung.tu-berlin.de/evasys/online.php?pswd=T48M5 QR Code:

Messages.Author: Shehab Gamaledin Abdulkader Hussein Aboulela
Messages.Content: Dear Students,  the link to evaluate the course is now available: https://befragung.tu-berlin.de/evasys/online.php?pswd=T48M5  The survey should take place from 17.06. to 28.06.2024, and takes about 5 - 10 minutes to complete it. I would like to ask you to participate in this survey. Please note that each person should only participate in the survey once per course.  You are also welcome to use the QR link below.  For any questions, please do not hesitate to contact us.  Best regards, Shehab Aboulela

Messages.Author: Shehab Gamaledin Abdulkader Hussein Aboulela
Messages.Content: Dear all,  On Friday 10.05.2024 and before the 2nd Praktikum, Mr. Michael Gruse from our Fachgebiet will give you a lab safety training. This training is necessary for you to be able to work at our laser workstations. It will take place in room HFT 312 from 09:00 am to 10:00 am.  Please reply to this message, if this date does not suite you, so that we can arrange another day.  Thank you. Best regards, Shehab Aboulela

Messages.Author: Shehab Gamaledin Abdulkader Hussein Aboulela
Messages.Content: Dear all,  Our first meeting will take place on Friday 19.04.2024 in room HFT 312 from 10:00 - 12:00. Best regards, Shehab Aboulela
